scripts.test: npm run-script build-example && elm make --docs=docs.json && elm-format --validate .
scripts.build-example: (cd example && elm make Main.elm && elm make AnimatedExample.elm && elm make Screenshots.elm --output screenshots.html)
scripts.build-screenshots: which pngcrush && which convert && which gifsicle && if [ ! -e node_modules/puppeteer ]; then npm install puppeteer; fi && npm run-script build-example && ./capture-screenshots.js && ./optimize-screenshots.sh
